hero.name: Raybel Hernández
hero.title: Full Stack Developer with strong frontend mobile and web expertise.
hero.subtitle: Passionate about F1's speed and precision in every line of code.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
about.description1: Software engineer with 4+ years in web and mobile development. Strong command of React and TypeScript on the frontend (component architecture, state management with Redux/Context, and web performance), plus specialization in Flutter/Firebase for cross‑platform products.
about.description2: I have led and contributed to projects like SnapnFund, All in Biking, and TimeForemost, integrating REST APIs, Stripe/QuickBooks, and Google Cloud. Focused on scalable solutions and smooth UX. An F1 fan for precision and speed—qualities I bring to code and teamwork.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce platform with React, Node.js and MongoDB

taskManager.title: Task Management App
taskManager.description: Task management application with drag & drop and real-time features

snapnfund.description: SnapnFund Development: SnapnFund empowers shoppers to turn everyday purchases into donations by scanning receipts and directing funds to partner nonprofits. I led the full-stack delivery across the Flutter mobile app, the React web experience, and Firebase + ASP.NET services, owning architecture, state management, and release automation. Worked within a SCRUM team to integrate OCR, secure payment workflows, and responsive UI refinements that kept the donor flow fast and reliable.

dealerslash.description: DealerSlash Marketplace: A vehicle buying and selling platform modernized from a legacy Java Spring API into a scalable ASP.NET Core backend. I drove the cloud migration to Google Cloud services and crafted a Flutter mobile experience with bespoke UI components, real-time inventory flows, and polished animations that made browsing and reserving vehicles feel premium.

automedic.description: AutoMedic Mobile: Built the Flutter app for AutoMedic, a franchise network of mechanic shops that handles preventative maintenance and emergency repairs. The mobile experience delivers live malfunction alerts, appointment scheduling, and QuickBooks-backed invoicing on top of Google Cloud infrastructure and ASP.NET APIs. Implemented advanced Google Maps capabilities for shop discovery, routing, and service reminders, highlighting deep expertise in mobile architecture and Dart.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's Talk!
contact.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting collaborations.
